---
title: "Textmining with tm package"
author: "Jaeyoon Han"
date: "2016-02-01"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
library(tm)
library(magrittr)
library(SnowballC)

jobs <- readLines("./data/steve.txt")

# For Mac
jobs <- iconv(jobs,"WINDOWS-1252","UTF-8") 

head(jobs)

steve_jobs <- jobs %>%
        tolower %>%
        removeNumbers %>%
        removeWords(stopwords()) %>%
        removePunctuation %>%
        stemDocument %>%
        stripWhitespace

head(steve_jobs)

write(unlist(steve_jobs), "./data/jobs.txt")

jobs <- read.table("./data/jobs.txt", fill = TRUE)
jobs <- as.list(jobs)

jobs_words <- c()
for(i in 1 : length(jobs)){
        jobs_words <- c(jobs_words, as.character(jobs[[i]]))
}

head(jobs_words, 50)

write(unlist(jobs_words), "./data/jobs_words.txt")
jobs_words <- read.table("./data/jobs_words.txt")
```
